attributes.action: To reform the pay and working conditions for bricklayers
attributes.additional_details: The bricklaying industry has taken a massive hit since COVID and we now have to do 5x the work for less pay we have to do ridiculous amounts of unpaid work satisfy local and external building inspectors ie. NHBC and the pay is constantly falling quarter by quarter
attributes.background: Take action within the construction industry. To give better pay to bricklayers and reform pay structures

rejection.details:
Decisions about wages are a matter for employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about your employment and wish to seek advice, you may want to contact Citizen's Advice: 
https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/work/
